sentence.Network_en: His pitching was a legend among major league hitters.

sentence.Network_en: He could not possibly have been poisoned as popular legend has it.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不可能像民间传说的那样被下了毒。

sentence.Network_en: He has become a legend in the annals of military history.
sentence.Network_cn: 他已成为军事史上的一个传奇。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in sense 4): from Old French legende, from medieval Latin legenda 'things to be read', from Latin legere 'read'. Sense 1 dates from the early 17th cent

entry.def: A legend is a very old and popular story that may be true.
If you refer to someone as a legend, you mean that they are very famous and admired by a lot of people.

example.ex: ...blues legends John Lee Hooker and B.B. King.
example.tran: 布鲁斯音乐大师约翰·李·胡克和B. B. 金

entry.tran: 传奇故事；家喻户晓的故事；热门故事
entry.def: A legend is a story that people talk about, concerning people, places, or events that exist or are famous at the present time.

example.ex: The incident has since become a family legend...
example.tran: 此事自此成为了家族传奇。

example.ex: His frequent brushes with death are the stuff of legend among the press.
example.tran: 他频繁地与死神擦肩而过，成了报章杂志的热门猛料。

means.word_mean: 1. a story about mythical or supernatural beings or events

stems_affixes.word_buile: il不+legitimate合法的→adj.不合法的,私生的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 法律的,法定的;合法的,正当的
stems_affixes.word_buile: leg法律+al……的→adj.法律的,法定的;合法的,正当的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 合法的, 合理的, 正统的
stems_affixes.word_buile: leg法律+itm+ate表形容词→adj.合法的, 合理的, 正统的
il不+legible可读的→adj.难读的,难认的
legend[n.传说,传奇;图例]+ary……的→adj.传说的,传奇的
de加强+leg法律+ate人,也可表示动词→加强法律之人→代表

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不法, 私生, 反常, 不合逻辑
stems_affixes.word_buile: illegitimate[adj.不合法的,私生的]+cy表名词→n.不法, 私生, 反常, 不合逻辑

stems_affixes.value_cn: 合法,墨守陈规,法律上的义务
stems_affixes.word_buile: legal[adj.法律的,法定的;合法的,正当的]+ity表名词→n.合法,墨守陈规,法律上的义务

stems_affixes.value_cn: 学院,高等专科学校,大学
stems_affixes.word_buile: col共同+leg讲,读,说+e→共同说,共同读的地方→大学
leg讲,读,说+end→讲出的东西→传奇的故事;引申为地图的图例

stems_affixes.value_cn: 功课,课;一堂课,一节课;[常复]课程;教训
stems_affixes.word_buile: less=leg讲,读,说+on表名词→讲话,教训→课
de加强+leg法律+ate人,也可表示动词→加强法律之人→代表
re反+leg法律+ate表动词→反法律的人被放逐

Sentence.sentence: So what made him the legend he still is today?

sentences.en: Both men were legends in their own time.
sentences.cn: 这两个人在他们各自的时代都是传奇式人物。

jushi.english: He was a legend in his own lifetime for his scientific discoveries.
jushi.chinese: 由于自己的科学发现,他在他那个时代是个传奇人物。

jushi.english: He is the hero of Greek legend.
jushi.chinese: 他是希腊传说中的英雄。

jushi.english: There are many legends in China.
